title: Sound On: Supply Chain Woes, Shutdown Deadline
itunes:title: Sound On: Supply Chain Woes, Shutdown Deadline
description:
Guests: John Porcari, Port Envoy to the White House Supply Chain Disruptions Task Force and former Deputy Secretary of Transportation, Rick Davis, Bloomberg Contributor and Partner at Stonecourt Capital, Jim Kessler, Co-Founder of Third Way, Democratic Strategist, and former Legislative Policy Director for Sen. Schumer, Jack Fitzpatrick, Bloomberg Government Reporter, and Emily Wilkins, Bloomberg Government Reporter.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
